short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RecruitBPM chrome extension enables recruiters to extract candidates and contacts directly from linkedin, dice and monster.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Source candidates and add contacts seamlessly directly from the popular websites, social media and job boards into RecruitBPM applicant tracking system.

It saves time by adding candidates or contacts from websites such as LinkedIn, LinkedIn Recruiter, Gmail, Monster and Dice on the go without having to manually enter the information. 

Simply click on the icon of RecruitBPM extension on top right to parse information from review and click submit to add the profile directly to RecruitBPM applicant tracking database.

It is simple, robust and powerful Try it now!
